name: Golf with Zatan (Prototype)
description:
Game page: https://www.gamesbygrads.com/golf-with-zatan

Golf with Zatan is an action-adventure sandbox that takes the meaning of golf to a whole new level. To snatch the coveted title of master golfer, you'll have to hone your skills and clear the course by whacking and smacking your way through a variety of environments and fun challenges.

Golf with Zatan is currently in development as part of the UK Games Fund's Tranzfuser programme.
